title: 1x1 Hot Top Floor, Park View Please
posting_body: It's not FIRE🔥 kind of HOT🌶️, but it is a Very desirable🔝floor 1 bedroom, 1 bath unit that will be available for move-in mid September.
This apartment is located in a perfect spot in downtown Walnut Creek where you have access to all you need within walking distance.
Come see what it's like to live at this beautiful complex.
We have beautifully landscaped grounds, a swimming pool, jacuzzi, and a BBQ area.
This unit has vaulted ceilings, view of the park, and beautiful tree shading, it's a no brainer!
Come and schedule a tour of our community and put in your application to hold this unit.
Applications: All adults (18 years or older) must complete an application.
Submit a government issued ID as well as a Social Security number for purpose of obtaining a consumer credit report.
References: All data and references provided on the application must be verifiable and all applicants must have good previous rental history.
Income: Applicants must make 2.5 times the amount of rent and provide recent pay stubs and bank statements reflecting the last two-three months.
Self-Employed applicants can provide previous year's tax return.
Credit and Background: Credit and background checks are processed on each applicant.
$40 application fee (each person over the age of 18 years)
Contact our leasing office for additional information.
Hours: Open 9:30 am – 5:30 pm for tours Monday through Saturday
